name: Project Re Fantasy: A Fool's Journey Begins
summary:
"Atlus has started work on a new kind of fantasy RPG, opening a new studio to handle the games development.

They game will be completely seperate from previous Atlus franchises and is planned to return to the roots of Japanese fantasy role-playing games.

They have not decided what platforms the game will be on and it will be a long time before the game is finished"
